name: Meathead's Word Within Words-BUR Online Trivia | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Here is how it works.  Add a word to BUR to make a new, longer word.  For instance, if I said "BUR + Fibs = ones who are strong and solid, you would answer "burlies," BUR + lies = burlies.

We'll start easy, with an "elemental" approach.

BUR + 39 on "The Table" = Conceal by digging a hole and covering it up
questions.explanation:
Bury.

	39 on "The Table" means the 39th element on the Periodic Table of Elements.  This is Yttrium, which is shown as "Y" on the PTE.

questions.text: BUR + Propel a boat using oars = Rabbit home
BUR + Bear home = Something hard to bear
BUR + Spot on legs when one is sitting down = Type of sack
BUR + Mr. Bigby or Mr. Nederlander = Singed
BUR + Loud noise, or preceder of pong = Belching
BUR + ___ de Cologne = Office that collects information
BUR + Bee bite = Exploding, as in laughter

Finally, we end with the longest word of the quiz.

BUR + Looking fiercely = Robbing
questions.explanation:
Burglaring.

	Technically, burglaring isn't a word, but it has been used as the act of burglary, or burglarization.  Burglaring is the act of burglarizing.
